login_dt: Login using email and password to continue with app
register_dt: Register as gatekeeper by filling in the below form
name: Name
serve_in_event_dialog_body: Are you sure you want to reserve this event?
some_error: Some error occured. Please try again
username_password_not_correct: Username or Password is not correct
confirm_reserve: Are you sure you want to reserve this event?
cannot_checkin: You cannot checking in to this event yet
check_in_successful: Checked in successfully to this event
check_out_successful: Checked out successfully from this event
event_calendar_instructions: Dates with available events are hightlighted. Tap on a date to show events on that specific date. Swipe the calendar to see next month.
checking_not_validated: Dear, you can check in only on the event day
checkout_not_validated: Dear, you can check out only on the event day
no_internet: It looks like you are offline. Please check your network and try again.
pending_approval_msg: You have been successfully registered!. Please wait for the admin approval
account_not_approved: Account Not Approved, please contact system administrator
location_permission_denied_long: Location permissions are permanently denied, we cannot request permissions. Enable location services from Phone Settings
include_country_code: Include Country Code with Phone Number
gatekeeper_notcheckedin_before_checkout: This gatekeeper didn't check IN yet to this event.
location_not_available: Location for this event is not available
not_sent_because_guest_declined_invitati: Not sent because guest declined invitation
cant_receive_message_due_to_whatsapp_pol: Can't receive message due to whatsapp policy
total_guests_cards_failed: Guests whose cards failed to send
register_error: Failed to register, please try again later
invalid_phone: Phone number must contain only numbers.
username_exists_error: This username already exists, please try again with another username
unauthorized_error: Unauthorized access, please check your credentials and try again.
unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later.
event_instructions_para1: We are honored and pleased to have you among MyInvite team. You are the foundation for success, and in order to rise and excel at the offered service, you must keep the following in mind during your coverage of the events:
event_instructions_step_1: Complete adherence to the times of arrival and departure from the site.
event_instructions_step_2: If you arrive at the site, go immediately to the party management, and inform them that you are the assigned supervisor from MyInvite.
event_instructions_step_3: Taking care of your external appearance, wearing MyInvite uniform and wearing MyInvite brooch.
event_instructions_step_4: Charge the mobile battery sufficiently to ensure that the battery does not run out. It is preferable to carry a portable charger for necessary and make sure there is strong Internet network coverage.
event_instructions_step_5: Scan the barcode of all guest cards and prevent visitors from entering if the card is not present or the barcode is incorrect by displaying an X and apologizing gently to the visitor.
event_instructions_step_6: The supervisor must, at the end of the work time, inform the event/wedding owners and the hotel or hall management before leaving the site to remove all responsibility.
event_instructions_note1: In the event of issues in the system, you must contact us immediately to inform the company of this and provide guidance and technical support to fix the defect.
event_instructions_note2: On each occasion, you will be provided with the numbers of the party owners to contact them in the event of a problem with one of the visitors.
scan_error_scanned_before: You have already scanned this code
event_not_attended: This event has not been attended yet
event_check_hint: Please confirm whether you are checking in or checking out of the event.
not_yet_checked: You need to check in to this event before you can perform this action.
checkInSuccess: You have successfully checked in. Welcome back!
checkOutSuccess: You have successfully checked out. See you next time!
cameraPermissionDenied: Camera access is denied. Please enable it in settings.
cameraInitFailed: Failed to initialize the camera. Please try again.
photoCaptureFailed: Failed to capture the photo. Please try again.
can_not_check_in_or_out: You cannot check in or out because the event date is not today.
location_is_not_set_correctly: Your location is not set correctly. Please contact our IT support team to update your location details in your profile.
